channel.title: Got more P Mod questions? Ask me
channel.description:
I figured I'd recreate this popular topic because my and Aftermath_96's lil word fight got it locked... Credit to Booduh for making the first one, and sorry we got it locked.
Yeh, I'm an actual P Mod. Don't really care if some people think I'm full of it.
I'll answer as many questions as I can, if anyone ever posts :|

item.title: Got more P Mod questions? Ask me
item.dc:creator: @bigtimekillr bigtimekillr
item.description:
@bigtimekillr wrote:

[quote=“uncfan1119, post:88, topic:7586”]You need atleast 7 successful reports, + atleast 1 years of experience, and no black marks.[/quote]woot i only need 7 reports

Read full topic

item.title: Got more P Mod questions? Ask me
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

Mod J:

Maybe you should have not broken the rules. Even if you did, you could have asked for another chance. But making up a story and calling him an “emo fag” won’t get it unbanned. Andrew wasn’t a dickhead, you were.

Very strong words from a “Mod” I might add.

Read full topic

FUCK YOU GOD DAMNED WANKER I HATE YOU! GO TO HELL YOU SON OF A BITCH I TOLD YOU I HAVE DISLEXIA AND DISPRAXIA AND HAVE BAD MOTERING SKILLS! I THINK YOU AND ALL THE OTHER CHAVS SHOULD GO TO HELL! YOU FUCKING MOTHER FUCKING DIPSHIT!
GROW A DICK AND STOP SUCKING YOUR MUMS TITS CHAV!

or you can look here List from Phonnygoblin
[[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:82, topic:7586”]rofl! that is hilarious!!

[quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=10635.msg226105#msg226105 date=1157719053]

and if anybody had botherd 2 read my writing it has proof this nerd isnt a mod (“mod j”), because thehate is not a player mod, it took me ages to write this properly, stop making fun of me, thank you.
i told u stfu moron!
nobody can read…
if u think he is a mod somehow and i am completely wrong please tell me your addres so i can hire sum1 2 kill u, dumbass.

You don’t have proof he isn’t a mod, every single player mod, does not know every single other player mod.
Even if this guy isn’t a mod, doesnt give you the excuse to flame and ramble on about crap nobody cares about whilst not being able to put together a proper sentence.
If you actually have a good argument then post it properly, and don’t use fuck in every sentence.

You spent ages doing that? Half of your words are spelt wrong and you have very poor gramma, if you took “ages” to write that up, why not take an extra 2 minutes to make it legible?

My address is 9-15 Buena Vista Drive Logan Village QLD Australia. Im waiting for the assassin so we can make jokes and laugh about how stupid you are over a drink.

Bitch.
[/quote][/quote]/quote] Original Daniel…you should actually look at the list before posting you tard…
